name: Cloud's Maze
body:
Cloud is a giggling girl you could hardly ignore when you find her lying on the lake below your buildings 3:43 in the morning. She is good at swimming and she loves staring into the universe.

She approaches the world through graphs. She sketches, draws, paints, connect dots. 

Right now, she is learning [Processing](http://processing.org) through working through the [Learning Processing](http://learningprocessing.com).

Some of her exercises could be found:

- [sample](http://kinkcloud.github.io/learning-processing/sample/)

She lives in Shanghai right now and works for [Gensler](http://www.gensler.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
